snippet: Workers at Venezuelan steelmaker Sidor are planting sunflowers and vegetables on company premises to ease a national food deficit as steel output has almost ground to a halt nine years after the company was taken over by the government....

headline.main: French President Calls for a Multi-Speed Europe
headline.print_headline: French President Calls for a Multi-Speed Europe

lead_paragraph: Workers at Venezuelan steelmaker Sidor are planting sunflowers and vegetables on company premises to ease a national food deficit as steel output has almost ground to a halt nine years after the company was taken over by the government.
